citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 AM on 3/8/23.
The inspector arrived at 11:45 AM on 3/8/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector tried to reach the Licensee by phone
(left voice message and sent a text) and then waited at the property. The inspector spoke with the Licensee and learned
that no one was available to accompany the inspector. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 AM on 3/8/23. 
 
The inspector arrived at 11:45 AM on 3/8/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector tried to reach the Licensee by phone 
(left voice message and sent a text) and then waited at the property. The inspector spoke with the Licensee and learned 
that no one was available to accompany the inspector. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted.  
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
 
End Section
